name: @vamship/grunt-utils
description: Utility library for grunt file configuration and grunt tasks

scripts.test: nyc mocha -R spec --recursive test/unit/ && nyc report --reporter=html
scripts.docs: jsdoc --readme README.md --package package.json --template node_modules/docdash --destination docs --recurse src
scripts.all: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean

author: Vamshi K Ponnapalli <vamshi.ponnapalli@gmail.com>
